context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: explore different possibilities for aid or assistance
reach out to local health organizations, charities, or nonprofit organizations for possible assistance or subsidies

seek help from various sources such as government programs, non-profit organizations, or drug company patient assistance programs that offer assistive measures for people who can't afford essential medications
seek out financial assistance through different avenues
explore different options to help them afford the medication
start a fundraising campaign, either online or within his local community
explore all possible options to afford the medication
seek financial assistance from different sources
seek financial assistance from various channels
explore various options to raise the necessary funds

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call for a taxi, Uber, or any other ride service immediately to ensure he gets to the airport on time

call for roadside assistance or a taxi service to get to the airport on time

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: immediately notify the bakery owner or his superior about the missing money
contact his supervisor or the owner to report the missing money
first check the register again and recount the money carefully
review the surveillance footage (if available) or transaction history to see if there were any errors or discrepancies which could explain the missing money
report the missing money to his superior or owner of the bakery
check the sales receipts and compare them with the inventory sold that day
contact his supervisor or the owner of the bakery and inform them about the missing money
immediately inform the owner or higher management about the missing money, explain the situation and offer to make up for the loss
report the missing money to his supervisor or the owner of the bakery, explaining the situation and his concerns
contact his superior or the owner of the bakery to report the missing money

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: find shelter to protect them from the harsh weather conditions
stay put in one location, ideally with shelter
stay in one place to increase their chances of being found
stay in one place
